statements: SELECT * FROM medication_adherence_tracking WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT medication_name, dosage_amount FROM medication_adherence_tracking;
SELECT * FROM medication_adherence_tracking WHERE dosage_amount > 100;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, last_taken FROM medication_adherence_tracking ORDER BY last_taken DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM medication_adherence_tracking;
SELECT * FROM medication_adherence_tracking WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, dosage_amount FROM medication_adherence_tracking WHERE dosage_amount > 50;
SELECT medication_name, dosage_frequency, last_taken FROM medication_adherence_tracking WHERE last_taken BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM medication_adherence_tracking ORDER BY medication_name DESC, dosage_amount ASC;
SELECT AVG(dosage_amount) AS avg_dosage, COUNT(patient_id) AS patient_count FROM medication_adherence_tracking WHERE dosage_frequency = 'Daily';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications WHERE frequency='Daily';
SELECT * FROM Medications ORDER BY medication_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender, phone_number FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender='Male' ORDER BY patient_age ASC
SELECT patient_name, dosage FROM Patients JOIN Medications ON Patients.patient_id = Medications.patient_id WHERE medication_name='Aspirin'
SELECT patient_name, phone_number FROM Patients WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%'

SELECT patient_name, COUNT(*) AS num_medications FROM Patients JOIN Medications ON Patients.patient_id = Medications.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY num_medications DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM reminders WHERE patient_id = 1
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM reminders ORDER BY dosage DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reminders FROM reminders
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS total_dosage_given FROM adherence_tracking GROUP BY patient_id
SELECT medication_name, reminder_time FROM reminders WHERE dosage > 50 ORDER BY reminder_time
SELECT * FROM reminders WHERE patient_id = 10 ORDER BY reminder_time DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, dosage FROM reminders WHERE medication_name LIKE 'Aspirin%'
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, SUM(dosage_given) AS total_dosage_given FROM adherence_tracking GROUP BY patient_id, medication_name

SELECT r.patient_id, p.name AS patient_name, r.medication_name, a.dosage_missed FROM reminders r JOIN patients p ON r.patient_id = p.id JOIN adherence_tracking a ON r.patient_id = a.patient_id WHERE a.dosage_missed > 0
SELECT r.medication_name, AVG(a.dosage_given) AS avg_dosage_given FROM reminders r JOIN adherence_tracking a ON r.patient_id = a.patient_id GROUP BY r.medication_name HAVING AVG(a.dosage_given) > 2
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob, phone_number FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT med_name, dosage FROM Medications WHERE dosage LIKE '%mg%';
SELECT med_name, med_description FROM Medications ORDER BY med_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM MedicationSchedule WHERE dosage_quantity > 2 ORDER BY schedule_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM Patients WHERE patient_dob >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT med_name, dosage FROM Medications WHERE dosage_quantity > 1 ORDER BY med_name;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Medications.med_name, MedicationSchedule.dosage_time FROM Patients, Medications, MedicationSchedule WHERE Patients.patient_id = 'abc-123' AND Medications.med_id = MedicationSchedule.med_id;
SELECT patient_name, phone_number FROM Patients WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, email FROM Patients;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM Medications;
SELECT schedule_date, time_of_day FROM MedicationSchedule;
SELECT reminder_date, reminder_time, is_sent FROM Reminders;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM Medications ORDER BY medication_name DESC;
SELECT p.name, r.log_date, r.log_time, rl.log_message FROM Patients p JOIN ReminderLogs rl ON p.patient_id = rl.patient_id JOIN Reminders r ON rl.reminder_id = r.reminder_id WHERE r.is_sent = TRUE;

SELECT ms.schedule_id, m.medication_name, p.name, rs.reminder_date, rs.reminder_time FROM MedicationSchedule ms JOIN Medications m ON ms.medication_id = m.medication_id JOIN Patients p ON ms.patient_id = p.patient_id JOIN Reminders rs ON ms.schedule_id = rs.schedule_id WHERE p.name LIKE 'J%';
